title: Modern JavaScript for Beginners
description: Learn modern JavaScript (ES6+) from scratch and build dynamic, interactive web applications using hands-on projects.

title: React Mastery: From Basics to Advanced
description: Master React.js with practical projects, hooks, context API, and routing. Learn to build fast, modern web apps.

title: Node.js & Express API Development
description: Build scalable backend systems using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Learn CRUD, authentication, and deployment.

title: Full Stack Web Development Bootcamp
description: Become a full-stack developer by learning React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Build real-world applications from start to finish.

title: UI/UX Design Essentials
description: Master Figma, color theory, typography, and responsive layout design to craft beautiful and functional interfaces.

title: Python Programming for Everyone
description: Learn Python from zero. Understand syntax, data structures, and work on mini projects like calculators and web scrapers.

title: Digital Marketing Fundamentals
description: Get hands-on with SEO, Google Ads, and social media campaigns to build your digital marketing strategy.

title: Advanced CSS & Tailwind Masterclass
description: Take your CSS skills to the next level with modern layouts, Tailwind CSS, animations, and responsive design.

title: MongoDB for Developers
description: Learn MongoDB fundamentals, CRUD operations, aggregation pipelines, and schema design for real-world apps.

title: DevOps with Docker & CI/CD
description: Understand Docker, GitHub Actions, and deployment pipelines to automate your application delivery process.

title: Data Analysis with Excel & Power BI
description: Learn to clean, visualize, and analyze data using Microsoft Excel and Power BI dashboards.

title: AI & Machine Learning Crash Course
description: Kickstart your AI journey. Understand supervised learning, neural networks, and real-world ML applications.
